00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Hydrodynamics
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00013 
00014 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00028 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE Hydrodynamics
00031 
00032 ! Common Variables
00033  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00034  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, ni, xl, xlg, xlg2, xu, xug, xug2, yl, ylg, ylg2, yu, yug, yug2
00035  USE FluidParams
00036  USE LBMParams, ONLY : Cs_sq, gbar
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invrho, gradRhoSqX, gradRhoSqY
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2, gradRhoXY2, gradRhoYX2, gradRhoYY2, lapRho
00043 
00044 
00045 !--------- Differential terms for the stress form of the interfacial force -----
00046  DO j = ylg, yug
00047    DO i = xlg, xug
00048 
00049 ! Identify first neighbors
00050      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00051      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00052      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00053      js = ni(i,j,4)
00054 
00055 ! Gradient of the density rho
00056      gradRhoX(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho(ie,j ) - rho(iw,j ) ) + rho(ie,jn) &
00057                    - rho(iw,js) + rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )*inv12
00058 
00059      gradRhoY(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho(i ,jn) - rho(i ,js) ) + rho(ie,jn) &
00060                    - rho(iw,js) + rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )*inv12
00061 
00062 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00063      gradRhoXX(i,j) = gradRhoX(i,j)*gradRhoX(i,j)
00064      gradRhoXY(i,j) = gradRhoX(i,j)*gradRhoY(i,j)
00065      gradRhoYY(i,j) = gradRhoY(i,j)*gradRhoY(i,j)
00066      gradRhoSq(i,j) = gradRhoXX(i,j) + gradRhoYY(i,j)
00067 
00068    END DO
00069  END DO
00070 
00071 !--------- Differential terms for the potential form of the interfacial force --
00072  DO j = ylg2, yug2
00073    DO i = xlg2, xug2
00074 
00075 ! Identify first neighbors
00076      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00077      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00078      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00079      js = ni(i,j,4)
00080 
00081 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00082      lapRho = 4.D0*( rho(ie,j ) + rho(iw,j ) + rho(i ,jn) + rho(i ,js) ) &
00083             + rho(ie,jn) + rho(ie,js) + rho(iw,jn) + rho(iw,js) - 20.D0*rho(i,j)
00084 
00085 ! Define chemical potential Psi
00086      psi(i,j) = beta4*( rho(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00087               - kappa_6*lapRho
00088 
00089    END DO
00090  END DO
00091 
00092 !--------- Velocity Calculation ------------------------------------------------
00093  DO j = yl, yu
00094    DO i = xl, xu
00095 
00096    invrho = 1.D0/rho(i,j)
00097 
00098 ! Identify neighboring cells
00099      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00100      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00101      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00102      js = ni(i,j,4)
00103 
00104 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00105      gradRhoSqX = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(ie,j ) - gradRhoSq(iw,j ) ) &
00106                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,jn)          &
00107                 + gradRhoSq(ie,js) - gradRhoSq(iw,js)
00108 
00109      gradRhoSqY = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(i ,jn) - gradRhoSq(i ,js) ) &
00110                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(ie,js)          &
00111                 + gradRhoSq(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,js)
00112 
00113 ! Second derivatives of rho
00114      gradRhoXX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX(ie,j ) - gradRhoXX(iw,j ) ) &
00115                 + gradRhoXX(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX(iw,js)          &
00116                 + gradRhoXX(ie,js) - gradRhoXX(iw,jn)
00117 
00118      gradRhoXY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(i ,jn) - gradRhoXY(i ,js) ) &
00119                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js)          &
00120                 + gradRhoXY(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY(ie,js)
00121 
00122      gradRhoYX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(ie,j ) - gradRhoXY(iw,j ) ) &
00123                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js)          &
00124                 + gradRhoXY(ie,js) - gradRhoXY(iw,jn)
00125 
00126      gradRhoYY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY(i ,jn) - gradRhoYY(i ,js) ) &
00127                 + gradRhoYY(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY(iw,js)          &
00128                 + gradRhoYY(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY(ie,js)
00129  
00130 ! Velocity calculation
00131      u(i,j,1) = invrho*( gbar(i,j,1) - gbar(i,j,3) + gbar(i,j,5) - gbar(i,j,6) &
00132               - gbar(i,j,7) + gbar(i,j,8) + 0.5D0*kappa_12*( gradRhoSqX        &
00133               - gradRhoXX2 - gradRhoXY2 ) )
00134 
00135      u(i,j,2) = invrho*( gbar(i,j,2) - gbar(i,j,4) + gbar(i,j,5) + gbar(i,j,6) &
00136               - gbar(i,j,7) - gbar(i,j,8) + 0.5D0*kappa_12*( gradRhoSqY        &
00137               - gradRhoYX2 - gradRhoYY2 ) )
00138 
00139    END DO
00140  END DO
00141 
00142 !--------- Pressure calculation ------------------------------------------------
00143  DO j = yl, yu
00144    DO i = xl, xu
00145      p(i,j) = Cs_sq*( gbar(i,j,0) + gbar(i,j,1) + gbar(i,j,2) + gbar(i,j,3)       &
00146             + gbar(i,j,4) + gbar(i,j,5) + gbar(i,j,6) + gbar(i,j,7) + gbar(i,j,8) &
00147             + 0.5D0*( u(i,j,1)*gradRhoX(i,j) + u(i,j,2)*gradRhoY(i,j) ) )
00148    END DO
00149  END DO
00150 
00151  RETURN
00152  END SUBROUTINE Hydrodynamics
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:19 2008 for LL-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
